item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Share on Both Instagram & Facebook!
item.description: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Share on Both Instagram & Facebook! Sharing content across multiple social media platforms can be a time-consuming task, but it doesn’t have to be! With this simple trick, you can instantly share content on both Instagram and Facebook with just one click. Overview of the Trick The trick is to use the “Share to” feature on Instagram. Once you’ve posted a photo or video to Instagram, you can click the “Share to” button and select Facebook as one of the platforms to share your post.
